short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents ad tracking by Facebook.
short.ru: Это расширение предотвращает рекламное слежение Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FB Anti-Tracker Online
Make the web faster, more private, and more secure.
Disconnect lets you visualize and block the facebook that track you.
